summary: The USS Arizona  was an American battleship.
full_text:
Arizona has been the name of three ships of the United States Navy.
USS Arizona , laid down in 1858 and served in the American Civil War.
USS Arizona , a steam frigate launched in 1865 as the USS Neshaminy. She was renamed twice, carrying the name Arizona for less than three months.
USS Arizona , a Pennsylvania-class battleship launched in 1915 and sunk by Japanese bombers in the attack on Pearl Harbor 7 December 1941.
See also
USS Arizonan 
SS Grand Canyon State
title: USS Arizona
